backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, playlists, favorites, and history with access control and playlist CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping offline-mode, local-only data, PWA caching, and UI text updates to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing many frontend components such as player UI, offline mode hooks, storage, and PWA-related files.
frontend/docs/pulse-player.md: Documentation outlining Pulse Player’s UI structure, navigation, key screens, and player interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes along with global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, PWA manifest, and mounting the app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing the app name, theme, start URL, and icons for installability.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing offline caching of static assets with versioned cache management and fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component registering the service worker and rendering the themed app shell with player context.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Main application shell managing navigation, offline/offline-only banners, profile setup, and page rendering.
frontend/src/app/offline/offlineOnlyMode: Manages reading and writing the offline-only mode setting in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/app/offline/useOfflineOnlyM: React hook to load and update offline-only mode state with loading status.
frontend/src/app/offline/useOfflineStatu: React hook tracking browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppBran: Header component showing themed background, app logo, and title.
frontend/src/components/loading/Indexing: Skeleton UI showing placeholder rows during media indexing.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar with tabs for music, video, library, and settings.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query reset.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name unless offline-only.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCurrentUse: React query hook fetching the current user profile when online and authenticated.
frontend/src/features/equalizer/Equalize: Equalizer settings UI loading and saving preset choice to IndexedDB.
Defines EQ presets, gain curves, and human-readable preset labels.
frontend/src/features/favorites/useFavor: Manages local favorites and optionally syncs changes to the cloud when online.
frontend/src/features/history/useHistory: Handles local play history and syncs additions/clears to the cloud when allowed.
frontend/src/features/library/AddLocalMe: Button and hidden file input for selecting and adding local media files.
frontend/src/features/library/EmptyLibra: Empty state view explaining local storage and offering media import.
frontend/src/features/library/LibrarySea: Search and sort UI for filtering and ordering media tracks.
frontend/src/features/library/LocalMedia: Alert explaining that media files are stored locally and work offline.
frontend/src/features/library/searchSort: Provides search and sort utilities for tracks and videos.
frontend/src/features/library/useLibrary: Loads media library from IndexedDB, indexes new files, and manages track lists.
frontend/src/features/player/audio/Audio: Wrapper around HTMLAudioElement providing playback control and event callbacks for time, duration, and state changes.
frontend/src/features/player/FullPlayerS: Full-screen audio player UI with playback controls, seek bar, volume slider, and track info.
frontend/src/features/player/MiniPlayerB: Compact bottom player bar showing current track with basic play/pause and next controls.
frontend/src/features/player/PlayerProvi: React context managing audio playback state, queue logic, repeat/shuffle, and AudioEngine integration.
frontend/src/features/playlists/AddToPla: Dropdown menu allowing a track to be added to any existing playlist.
frontend/src/features/playlists/Playlist: Displays a playlist’s tracks with options to play all or delete the playlist.
Panel listing playlists with creation dialog and navigation to playlist detail view.
frontend/src/features/playlists/usePlayl: Hook for loading, creating, updating, and syncing playlists locally and optionally to the cloud.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/Em: UI placeholder shown when no recommendation activity exists.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/re: Computes recommendation scores for tracks based on favorites, history, and artist matches, returning the top 10 non-favorite tracks.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/Re: Displays recommended tracks or a fallback state when no activity is present.
frontend/src/features/recommendations/us: Hook that combines library, favorites, and history to memoize and expose recommended tracks and activity status.
frontend/src/features/settings/exportDat: Exports all local data and optional cloud data to a downloadable JSON file.
frontend/src/features/settings/PlaybackS: UI card for toggling video gesture controls using stored player settings.
frontend/src/features/settings/usePlayer: Hook for loading, updating, and persisting player settings such as gesture controls.
frontend/src/features/sleep-timer/SleepT: Sleep timer UI that lets users set a duration or view and cancel an active timer.
frontend/src/features/sleep-timer/useSle: Hook managing a countdown timer that pauses playback when time expires.
frontend/src/features/tracks/TrackAction: Renders like/favorite button and playlist menu actions for a track.
frontend/src/features/tracks/TrackList.t: Displays a list of tracks with play controls, metadata, and per-track actions.
frontend/src/features/video/EmptyVideoSt: Static empty-state component prompting users to add videos.
frontend/src/features/video/VideoPlayerV: Full-screen video player with playback, seeking, fullscreen, and control overlay logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and exporting cloud data, respecting actor availability and offline-only mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes, including safe area helpers and reduced motion rules.
frontend/src/lib/media-utils.ts: Utility functions for formatting media durations and file sizes into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/media/metadata.ts: Extracts metadata from media files using filename parsing and duration extraction via Audio/Video elements.
frontend/src/lib/storage/indexedDb.ts: IndexedDB wrapper defining media-related stores and CRUD helpers for tracks, playlists, favorites, history, and settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Library page showing audio and video collections with search, sort, add-local-media, and indexing states.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music dashboard showing recommendations, playlists, recently played tracks, and favorites.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page handling theme, offline-only mode, login, and exporting local/cloud data.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPage.tsx: React page that lists video tracks from the library, showing title and size or an empty-state message when none exist.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, spacing, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing offline-first requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for the Pulse Player app.
